long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is 'Water'?
'Water'(https://howsthewater.netlify.com/) is a free web application aiming to reveal the physical layer of the World Wide Web to its users. The app provides a geo-localizing function which allows the users to look up websites' hosting servers across the globe.

What is 'Water Engine'?
'Water Engine' is a constituent part of the web project 'Water'(https://howsthewater.netlify.com/). The function of this extension is collecting url information from other open tabs in the Chrome browser and sending them to the 'Water' tab.
